pinyin: shui4 mian2 hu1 xi1 zan4 ting2

sentences.english: Suspended isn't broken. It's just suspended.
sentences.chinese: 假死状态并没有被破坏什么，只是暂停。

sentences.english: Next week we shall be closed for stock-taking.
sentences.chinese: 下星期我们暂停营业盘点存货。

sentences.english: The move puts the brakes on efforts to improve relations between the two countries' defense establishments.
sentences.chinese: 这一举动令改善中美两军关系的努力暂停。

sentences.english: Nearby performers would stop at that time.
sentences.chinese: 邻近的表演者届时会暂停。

sentences.english: Paused lifts the hand in the past's light youth to cancel the recollection.
sentences.chinese: 暂停中取消回忆过去的光青年举起手。

sentences.english: Obesity can also contribute to sleep apnea.
sentences.chinese: 肥胖也会导致睡眠呼吸暂停。

sentences.english: Last week she ordered a halt to all dismissals of gay service members.
sentences.chinese: 上周，该法官下令暂停解雇所有同性恋服役人员。

sentences.english: The football had to be paused because of the barbaric supporters.
sentences.chinese: 殷为那些野蛮的助威者，劂球比赛郴得不暂停。

sentences.english: In Fujian and Zhejiang, another coastal province, train services were suspended, flights canceled and fishing boats called back to ports.
sentences.chinese: 闽浙两省的高铁暂停运营，航班被取消，渔船归港。

sentences.english: The Lawn Tennis Association suspended Mr Castle from the British team.
sentences.chinese: 草地网球协会暂停了卡斯尔先生在英国队的职务。

sentences.english: A: I think I’m going to give up studying English for a while. I’m too busy.
sentences.chinese: 我想暂停一段时间不学英语，我太忙了。

sentences.english: In this situation, a task can be suspended.
sentences.chinese: 在这种情况之下，可以暂停一个任务。

sentences.english: How to successfully pause game in Corona SDK?
sentences.chinese: 如何成功地暂停游戏科罗娜啤酒SDK？

sentences.english: Before moving on, it would be good to hit the pause button for a minute to emphasize a few points.
sentences.chinese: 在继续之前，最好暂停一下，先来着重强调几点。

sentences.english: Pending the treaty's entry into force, I urge all States to implement a moratorium on all nuclear explosions.
sentences.chinese: 在条约生效之前，我敦促所有国家暂停所有核爆炸。

sentences.english: These processes cannot contain any activity that causes them to be suspended.
sentences.chinese: 这些流程不能包含任何能使他们暂停的活动。

definition: to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
to cease/to suspend/to break off/to stop/to discontinue
to go smoothly/to come off/to succeed
to reverse (the score)/to pull off a comeback/to take the lead
